dataset_id: BOREAS/SRC AMS Suite B Surface Meteorological and Radiation Data: 1995
title: BOREAS/SRC AMS Suite B Surface Meteorological and Radiation Data: 1995
summary: Contains the data collected in 1995 by the AMS suite B instrument set operated by SRC and provided to BORIS.
